application.name: ocams2isis
application.brief: Import OSIRIS-REx Camera Suite (OCAMS) files into ISIS format

description.p: This program will import FITS (Flexible Image Transport System) formatted files from the OSIRIS-REx MapCam, SamCam, and PolyCam instruments into the ISIS format.

history.change: Updated to only include labels requested by the OSIRIS-REx team
Changed category from base program to supported mission
Modified to reflect ProcessImportFits method name change from fitsLabel to fitsImageLabel.
Updated to translate PolyCam kernels separately from other cameras. Fixes #5128

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.brief: An OSIRIS-REx OCAMS FITS file to be converted to an ISIS cube
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the filename of an OSIRIS-REx MapCam, SamCam, or PolyCam file to be converted to an ISIS cube. This is expected to be a FITS formatted file.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: The output cube file that will contain the OSIRIS-REx OCAMS image in ISIS format.
